channel.title: Acolyte - Cult Class
channel.description:
Acolyte - Cult Killer Conversion Class
Day Ability: Sacrifice [1 Use] Sacrifice yourself to make all Cult not suspicious tonight.
Night Ability 1: Protect [Infinite Uses] Choose a member of the Cult to Guard at Night, you will take your life for theirs if they are attacked.
Night Ability 2: Guidance [1 Use] Confirms that the Cult Leader will visit their target.

item.title: Acolyte - Cult Class
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
unless it appears as something else when it dies, doesn’t it kind of backfire? knight scumreads CL, he attacks CL, acolyte dies CL isn’t dead. he now 100% knows he picked the right target.

Read full topic
